website_summaries.verdict: This aptly named pair lights up for an eye-catching ride. Great for kids, but might not support adults.
pros: Motion-activated LED wheels light up automatically, no batteries required
Fits a wide range of shoe sizes
Easy to adjust and get on and off
Good weight capacity of 132 pounds Available in 3 vibrant colors
cons: Maximum weight capacity might not hold adults hoping to join in the fun

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy These
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son and they only lasted two skates before they started t fall apart
customer_reviews.author: danita spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great Heelies Alternative
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and I love they can work on any shoe and grow with them! I do recommend knee pads at first...we had a bad skinned knee getting use to them.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY

customer_reviews.title: It's a HIT!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 y/o granddaughter went berserk over these skates. You'd have thought she'd won the lottery!
customer_reviews.author: Tbascoebuzz

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter asked for these for her birthday. She loves them! I almost didn't get them due to other reviews I saw. I probably wouldn't get them for my 6 year old unless he was a pro skater. They were perfect for my teenager, though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Love these! One of the best purchases of outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! One of the best purchases of outdoor toys I made this summer. Make sure you get a pair for the friends

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these and wears them throughout the house

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are very fun to use. The only downside is that they are a bit hard to put on.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. Bought as a gift, recipient was quite pleased. A little learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: JimE

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 8-11 year old girl!
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Easy to use. Wish the clip was differently designed so the kids could adjust and clip them more easily by themselves. But it's not a deal breaker. Great mid-range gift for 8-11 year old girls. Nice colors, great for anyone sporty.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tim

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these! Took a bit of getting ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! Took a bit of getting used to since the wheels are only on the heels, but he got the hang of it quick!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great rollers. Better than the shoes with rollers. My son loves th hem.
customer_reviews.author: Mommytwoboys

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My kids were very excited about the neon street rollers after seeing them on TV. They have loved trying them out so far. The lights are very fun!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift for my grand-son....he loved them. They take some practice to have the coordination to stay up.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It has a learning curve, but she got it in a couple of days ( 8 year old). Planing on taking it on our vacation, easy to put on a tote or backpack.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to get a little more practice with balance but the rollers are just fine!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.text: My Nephew loves them so far but it is snowing. So waiting for him to tell me more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they met my expectations, but my 8 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: they met my expectations, but my 8 year old gave up on them in 15 minutes. He couldn't keep his balance or figure them out and quit. Ugh. A lot of money for 15 minutes. THey are well made, were packaged well, and he really wanted them at the time, LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon quest

customer_reviews.title: Not so fun.
customer_reviews.text: My eight yr old wanted these so bad...they are really tricky and frankly ridiculously difficult. He has mastered two wheel scooter and bike at 3 yrs old so balance is not an issue. Not so fun as they sit in his closet...the parts are difficult to set up on the shoe and are now missing. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Nichole M Bruhn

customer_reviews.title: At first it was hard to control, then once ...
customer_reviews.text: At first it was hard to control, then once you get the hang of it, my daughter loves her Xmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Ruby T.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is loving all the attention!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these!! During the snowy winter we have had she rides them through the mall. Everybody stops to stare. She has gotten a billion ooohs and aaahs! Lots of people asking where to get them!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper Girl

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED !!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my granddaughter and have them to her on her birthday yesterday and the strap on one of them already broke!! I really expected them to last longer than a day !!
customer_reviews.author: Carols

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to put on and fit on shoes. Great idea but tough to get on shoe correctly

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed Strap
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, poorly designed. Daughter wore these once and the pieces that hold the strap on came off and got lost somewhere. Completely useless now. Wish I could get spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: LovinHawaii

customer_reviews.title: Really hard to use
customer_reviews.text: These are a great concept and my boys were excited to use them. Neither one of them have been able to use them though the way the photos show which has been disappointing. I've read and re-read the instructions, but they just can't figure them out.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Bunt

customer_reviews.title: They look cool, but a total bummer
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult for my son to use. They look cool, but a total bummer.

customer_reviews.author: Arien

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea
customer_reviews.text: A little hard for my daughter to get used to, but it did help teach her balance.
customer_reviews.author: Mystikal

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Not at all easy to use and the "instructions" are lacking. We watched a bunch of youtube videos and my 9 year old could not get it down. My husband almost feel on his bum trying to skate with them. It is just too unnatural feeling.
customer_reviews.author: MellyWhoDo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson could not fix them over his shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KingTay32

customer_reviews.title: Ordering & receiving was fantastic! It's a Christmas gift for my son so ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordering & receiving was fantastic! It's a Christmas gift for my son so I can't leave an Actual review on the rollers. I'll come back and update after Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Shaleigh77

product_meta.title: Yvolution Neon Street Rollers - Blue
product_meta.description: Revolutionize your favorite pair of shoes instantly with the neon street roller. Neon street roller marks a new beginning for roller skating. No longer are you confined to traditional roller skates, you can personalize your own look so your neon street rollers can match each unique personality/mood with its easily transferable clip-on nature. Simply adjust, strap in, and go! it's as simple as that. Featuring innovative wheel technology, the leds within the wheel light up as the wheels turn, emitting a neon glow that will leave others trailing in your dust. No batteries are required to see this amazing effect
feature_bullets: ✨ TRANSFORM YOUR SHOES - Turn your regular shoes into roller skates in seconds and keep the fun rolling! Neon Street Rollers are versatile and fun way to get around, turning the most mundane trips (like the school run) into a mini adventure.

✨ LIGHT UP THE NIGHT - Featuring innovative wheel technology, the LEDs within the wheel light up as the wheels turn, emitting a Neon glow that will leave others trailing in your dust. No batteries are required to see this amazing effect!

✨ FULLY ADJUSTABLE - Lightweight and less bulky than traditional skates, our heel wheels are fully adjustable to fit your favorite pair of shoes. Suitable for ages: 6+ years old. max user weight: 132 lbs.
✨ SAFE & SECURE - These heel wheels come with a rubber strap for safety and performance and larger brakes for stopping quickly.
✨ WARRANTY - Quality is all we ask from our product and service. We offer 100% guarantee and it's easy to contact us via email or phone.
